leftHalf.title: Digital transformation resources for CIOs
leftHalf.copy:
__Explore insights and solutions aimed at reducing IT complexity and supporting innovation__

The CIO role offers ambitious technical leaders the chance to shepherd their organization's digital journey and enable new growth areas.

Yet challenges like compliance, outdated infrastructure, and cost pressures often stand in the way. We curated these resources, perspectives, and solutions to help address those challenges.

primaryCta.elementName: Talk to an expert - CIO hero

buttonModal.title: Contact us today
buttonModal.regularCopy: CIOs explore the advantages, power, and efficiency of Cloudflare's connectivity cloud with enterprise-tier plans that have transparent costs.

imageAsset.altText: Hero Image - Speed, Security, Reliability Everywhere Globe
imageAsset.title: Hero Image - Speed, Security, Reliability Everywhere Globe - July 2023 (smaller)

features.title: Survey: Tackling IT complexity
features.description: This Forrester Consulting study quantifies the sources and impact of IT complexity and the resulting loss of control for IT and security organizations.

features.title: Say goodbye to egress fees forever
features.description: Learn how to control surging egress fees before they complicate your multi-cloud strategy.

features.title: Learn how tech leaders are integrating AI into apps, securing complex networks
features.description: Explore executive perspectives on trends, challenges, and opportunities, now in an easily readable magazine format.

features.title: CIO response to 'Cyber War' headlines
features.description: The TSA recently announced that the U.S. is in a 'Cyber War' and uncovered security gaps that leave organizations vulnerable. Regardless of the country you operate in, CIOs should now scrutinize their environments for these 4 prevalent pitfalls.

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - CIO response to 'Cyber War' headlines - Image

features.title: Securing the AI revolution everywhere
features.description: There is incredible opportunity in using AI, but this technology also presents challenges that may be addressed through cyber security

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Future Internet - Securing the AI revolution - image

features.title: Overcoming the challenges of data sovereignty
features.description: More than 100 countries have enacted laws aimed at protecting the privacy of their citizen's personal information—and that's a good thing. However, complying with these laws can pose serious challenges to global businesses

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Future Internet - Overcoming the challenges of data sovereignty - series - Image

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is a foundation for CIO innovation
relatedBlades.copy:
__Our connectivity cloud makes it simpler and more cost effective to build the tech stack of your dreams__

Cloudflare's connectivity cloud is a unified platform of cloud-native services that provides secure, any-to-any connectivity for the entire IT environment.

We deliver the security, reliability, and customizability CIOs need to overcome common digital transformation roadblocks.

relatedBlades.title: New Forrester study: The Total Economic Impact™ of Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: Forrester found that our connectivity cloud delivered a 238% ROI over 3 years by boosting productivity, security efficiency, protection and more.

button.elementName: New Forrester study - New Component - Button

statsFeatures.description: Improve tech team efficiency by up to 50% *
Improve customer retention due to network performance by up to 24% *
Reduce implementation costs by up to 75% *

relatedBlades.description: The world's leading enterprises trust Cloudflare to deliver speed, security and reliability everywhere.
